name: finishing writing that story in this cozy and peaceful rental cottage
name_original: finishing writing that story in this cozy and peaceful rental cottage
description:
all authors have their writing rituals, but inspiration can sometimes be found anywhere!

in game, you can type help for the available commands.

a text-based adventure game where you are a writer who needs to finish writing that story. you have rented this cottage out in the forest so that you cannot avoid it anymore. can you explore the rooms and find the inspiration you need to finish writing your tale?

if you reach the end, please share your stories!

made in the little time i had during the 50th godot wild jam.

no audio, but you could say it fits the feel of these old-time text-based games. had ideas for every wildcard, but none of that made it into the game.
